DataElement.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Comment Value Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field describing Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events comments.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Comment Domain Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Comment Value
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to comments._A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event._The importance assigned to a particular remark.

Property.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Comment Value
Property.preferredDefinition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.:The importance assigned to a particular remark.

Concepts.longName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
Concepts.definition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.
The importance assigned to a particular remark.
